item.title: Develop a XAPI training program from 2, two hour videos and a powerpoint - Upwork
item.description:
I have recorded a live presentation taking about 2 hours from two different camera views a have a powerpoint that I want to produce into a training course.

The work would include editing the videos and powerpoint to show different shots, and views while showing the powerpoint as well.

I would make this into a training program that will need to be in Xapi (and maybe a MP4 video) format for a learning management system.

I would work with you to make this a high quality training program.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Training Presentation, Video Editing
Skills: Training Presentation, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
